about_the_game:
Pick your contracts. Hunt your targets. Collect the bounty.

Embody the overwhelming aggression and power of a fearsome warrior with The Goliath Skin Pack DLC. Stomp the weak in your Goliath-themed armour and get choppin’ with your heavy cleaver knife skin. Your mastiff is drenched in the blood of the slain and can be directed with a Goliath chew toy.
